name: product-matcher
title: AI Product Matcher
description: Use this AI product matching actor whenever you need to find matching pairs of products from different e-shops for dynamic pricing, competitor analysis or market research. You can read more about the various use-cases [here](https://apify.com/product-matching-ai). If you would prefer us to prepare and manage the whole pipeline (including scrapers if they are needed), you can read more about it and contact our enterprise team [here](https://apify.com/enterprise).
